subtitle: Chicken breasts are marinaded in a flavourful mixture of lime, ginger, garlic and soy sauce which is then thickened to make a delicious sauce.

method.text: In a food processor, blend together the lime juice, rind, ginger, garlic and soy sauce. Place chicken in the dish and pour over marinade. Cover and leave for 8-2 days.
Place chicken and marinade in an ovenproof dish. Cover and cook in the oven for 30-35 min, turning occasionally. When cooked, drain meat juices into a pan.
In a cup, blend the water and cornflour together. Blend with the meat juices. Bring to the boil, stirring constantly.
Arrange chicken on a serving dish. Pour over the sauce and serve.

title: Ginger and lime chicken
